Package controller.controllerclient

Interface ClientControllerClientInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientController
    public interface ClientControllerClientInterface
    Interface implemented by ClientController. It contains all the method that can be used by a View

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void attachView​(View view)
      Method used if the View needs to notify the ClientController the new View object
      GameMapView getMap()
      This method returns the last valid GameMap
      void login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      This method is used to allow a Client to login after a disconnection
      void login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String color)
      This method is used to allow a Client to register to the Server for the first time
      void pick​(java.lang.String id, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> choices)
      This method is called by the View to notify the Server that a new choice has been made.
      void quit()
      This method is used if the Client want to definitively quit the game.
      void restartSelection()
      This method is used by the client to restart the action.
      void rollback()
      This method is used by the client to repeat the last selection

    • Method Detail

      • pick

        void pick​(java.lang.String id,
          java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> choices)
        This method is called by the View to notify the Server that a new choice has been made.
        Parameters:
        id - Contains the type of the action to be performed and an identifier of the action.
        choices - A list containing all the index of elements that have been chosen. PickTarget and PickAction only analyze the first element of the List.

      • restartSelection

        void restartSelection()
        This method is used by the client to restart the action.

      • rollback

        void rollback()
        This method is used by the client to repeat the last selection

      • login

        void login​(java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password,
           java.lang.String color)
        This method is used to allow a Client to register to the Server for the first time
        Parameters:
        username - The username chosen by the User. It must be unique
        password - The password used to allow reconnection after timeout/disconnection
        color - The color chosen by the User

      • login

        void login​(java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password)
        This method is used to allow a Client to login after a disconnection
        Parameters:
        username - The username chosen by the User. It must be unique
        password - The password used to allow reconnection after timeout/disconnection

      • quit

        void quit()
        This method is used if the Client want to definitively quit the game. No reconnection is allowed after that.

      • getMap

        GameMapView getMap()
        This method returns the last valid GameMap

      • attachView

        void attachView​(View view)
        Method used if the View needs to notify the ClientController the new View object
